1.content:
Start things off how you please. These are merely jumping off points.

Keep in mind that even if you start a story in one section, you're fully allowed to blend the other topics into them. Think Timon should be a thick muscled meerkat and then lose it all to becoming an obese blob? Go for it. Think Pumbaa should be several stories tall before he inflates? By all means. Feel free to include other "friends" too, Simba, Rafiki, the Hyenas, Zazu, as you like.

Anything is allowed, slobby stuff (farting, belching, drooling) and more "detailed" descriptions as well. Enjoy.
1.title: Starting Things Up

choices: Very addicting, fatty plants are consumed by Timon.
A milkshake machine enourages Simba & the pair into an eating contest.
Timon plays a prank that enlarges Pumbaa.
The pair are the victims of a tribe that wants to fatten them to large sizes.
11.content: Here are a few story ideas to try out. If you don't like any of them, use the free choice selection to execute your own idea instead.
11.title: A Few Choices and Free Choice

choices: Simba (or one of the other lions of the pride)
111.content:
The sun dawned early as usual over the African savanna. Predators began preparing for the morning hunt. Birds sang in the trees. And one stinkbug was crawling in the half open mouth of one snoring Meerkat. At the moment anyway.
"ACK! PTHBBBBB! YUCK!" The cry rang out over the savanna from a nearby oasis.
Much closer at hand, another creature stirred. "Timon? Is that you? What happened?" The companion of the meerkats muttered groggily and stretched slowly. Nearby he could see Timon head down in the stream, making all sorts of sputtering noises.
"I'll tell you what happened," The irate meerkat muttered. "I was having a nice dream about the most delicious succulent grubs in the world... And then I wake up to find a stinkbug in my mouth!"
The warthog winced. "Ew, nasty!"
"Exactly Pumba. It's gonna take the rest of the day to try and get the taste out of my mouth. If I can it all."
"Yeah. Though it is kind of weird don't ya think?"
Timon gave Pumba an odd look. True the Warhog was not terribly bright, but he had his moments, and Timon had learned that, while annoying, such moments were not to be ignored. "What Pumba?"
"It's just that we're bug lovers and yet stink bugs are gross. Don't you think that's weird?"
This apparently was not one of those times.
"Pumba, they're /stink/ bugs! How appetizing can they be if they smell so bad!?"
"Oh. Right."
Timon sighed. "I need a little time alone. See you in a bit."
And without looking back, Timon strode off through the undergrowth.

In truth the walk lasted a lot longer than a little while. Not that Timon would ever admit he was lost in a place he'd called home for a few years now, but he'd never learned the full layout of the place. And with every underbrush smack in the face his bad mood grew. Finally Timon slumped down under a bush to stew. He'd barely sat down for a minute though when the nasty taste in his mouth asserted itself again.
Gagging Timon tried grabbing some nearby leaves to wipe his tongue down with. Oddly enough, Timon found the taste dissipating.
"Mm, these leaves aren't so bad." he smiled, glad to finally have that taste out of his mouth. Plucking another leaf from the bush he was sitting under, he looked at it closely, but to him it looked no more special than any other plant. Hesitantly he nibbled on the leaf surprised at how good it tasted. It was like his dream from last night had some true, though he was surprised to find himself thinking plant leaves were tasty.
Downing the leaf in a few chomps he began gathering more to take back with him to Pumba, but as he started walking he started munching on the leaves as well. And before he was even out of sight of the bush, he was surprised to discover the bushel he'd had in his arms was almost all gone.
"What the heck...?" Timon turned and went back to the bush and began gathering more. This time he'd made it even less distance before the leaves were all eaten.
"Something weird's going on here."
Then came a loud noise through the bushes. It was...
111.title: Leaves a Bad Taste in Your Mouth

1111.content:
Pumbaa. "What, what's the problem?" shouted Timon as he ran toward the scream from the bushes as he recognized his friends voice. Behind the bushes Timon could not believe what he saw. Pumbaa had stuffed his face with the leaves (looked just like the one's he had been eating) and had expanded in size Timon got worried. Would this happen to him too?
"What happened to you?" asked Timon for his own concern more than Pumbaa's.
"I started looking for bugs in these bushes. I could not find no bugs and I was hungry, so I ate the leaves. They tasted so delicious. The next thing I know I became fat."
"You mean fatter!" Timon pointed out to his pig pal and burst out laughing.
Suddenly Timon felt a weird sensation inside of him. "What's going on?" Timon asked Pumbaa. Pumbaa didn't reply. All of a sudden Timon expands to but became bigger than Pumbaa. Timon was so obese he could not move.
Pumbaa's eyes glowed in the sight of his big fat friend and started laughing back at Timon. "You ate the leaves too!"
"So what if I did! I might like being fat!" Timon tried to think positive about the situation even though it was hard. "Why do you think these plants make us grow fat?"
Suddenly they heard a laughing nearby. It was...
1111.title: The Leaves Make Us Fat

11112.content:
Almost out of nowhere a hyena trio jumped into view and surrounded the blubbery two, cackling harder and louder than before. Shenzi, Bonzai, and Ed paced around two of the fattest, juiciest looking butterballs they'd ever seen, drool spilling from their mouths and wetting the ground before them. Pumbaa backed into Timon, his rear resting against Timon's fat-laiden back, Timon's head simply sunk into his bulk and stared at the monsters before him. "Uh...oh..." Pumbaa whimpered.

"Would you look at that!" Bonzai spoke with resounding glee. "Just one of these guys could stuff you for a year!" He prodded at Pumbaa's flabby belly, straining to hold in his giggling.

Shenzi laughed almost as hard and stuck her face in the massive body of Timon. "What about this porker!? Hahahahahah! I think I'd explode if I took a bite outta him!" Ed merely jabbered and broke into hysterics at the thought.

"N-n-now, now!" Timon attempted to pull his plump face from his bulked out body, wobbling and quivering as he shifted his weight, stifling a belch at the same time. Pumbaa's overengorged rear end still resting warmly on his back. "What's all this talk of biting, and eating? What kinda mook do you take us for? We're...we're horrible tasting!"

"Uhh...y-yeah!" Pumbaa chimed in, his chins quivering as he attempted to look back at his tubby buddy. "Horrible tasting!"

"That's right! And you wouldn't wanna know what my friend here is filled with!" Timon stated matter-of-factly about his flatulent friend. "Right!...Wait, what?" Pumbaa looked confused.

Shenzi shook with laughter, Bonzai and Ed joined in, their booming laughing shaking every fat cell in Timon and Pumbaa's body, the hyenas mouths opened so wide as they laughed, slobber flecked against the duo's bods. "These tubs think they're funny!" Shenzi bellowed.

"I hurt! Hahahah! We've gotta shut them up!" Bonzai was rolling in the dirt and holding his pot-belly. Shenzi suddenly stopped laughing and the air filled with a serious tone, she snapped and snarled in Timon's face, pressing her snout against his own. "Problem is...I'M still hungry big butt!"

Timon stuttered, his body wobbled violently as he shook with fear...he was too heavy to run, he was going to have to do something. "Then...then that's perfect! We've got JUST the thing! These fabulous leaves here..." Timon held up one of the surviving leaves, thankfully hidden in one of his fatty side rolls "...These are guaranteed to stuff you silly! You'll never need another meal...particularly of the warthog and meerkat type, heh heh!"

Shenzi snarled, spittle flying against Timon's face. "I don't LIKE salads..."

"Eh, just...try it? What could it hurt!??" Timon could feel his flab shaking, Pumbaa's weighty butt pushing further into his back. Pumbaa was sweating, his nerves were certainly getting the better of him, looking from hyena to hyena...
11112.title: hyenas

choices: The hyenas eat more leaves to gain more weight
The hyenas want to squash some more lions
111121.content:
"You better not be pulling one on us, fat boy!" said Shenzi. "I'm not, honestly," replied Timon. The hyenas walked up to the leaves, and began to chomp on them. Eventually, the effects of the leaves began to take in effect.

Just then, the hyena's bellies began rumbling, and they expanded until they got over 5 times fatter. "Holy cow!" yelled Banzai. Ed laughed in surprise. "Consider yourself lucky brat," said Shenzi. "Since you told us about these great leaves, we ain't gonna eat you." The fat hyenas slowly walked off, knowing thier next goal. "thank you ms. Shenzi," called Pumbaa.

The 3 hyenas made thier way to Pride Rock. The only lions there were Simba and Nala. They looked shocked at the FAT hyenas. "Remember us," laughed Shenzi. The hyenas rolled on the lions, and they were squashed. "A lion's much better flat," joked Banzai.

Since everyone was in fear of being squashed by the hyenas, they became the new rulers of the Pride lands. One day, they decided..
111121.title: Fat Hyenas Rule!!

choices: They got the hang of it.
1111211.content:
Shenzi, Banzai, and Ed woddle out in the Pride Lands get more of those leaves. They thought if they gain more weight, more of the animals would fear them more.

"Shenzi, are you sure it's a good idea to get more of the leaves?" Banzai said. "Of course, stupid. No one would challenge our rule if we are bigger." Explained Shenzi. Ed nodded this head rapidly. "Fine. But I still rather get some actual meat." Banzai said.

The hyenas ate even more of those leaves. Soon, their bellies rumbled and growed. Soon that they got bigger and bigger. They we now twice the size they were before. "Let's see how everyone treats us now." Shenzi said. Ed laughed manically. "Uhhh, guys? We can't move." The hyenas tried moving, but they were too big. All they can do is wobble.

"This shouldn't be THIS hard to move." Shenzi said. Just they were trying to moved......
1111211.title: More leaves, more weight.

11112111.content: While the hyenas had thought Simba and Nala were flattened under their enormous weights, the lions were able to escape pretty easily, lying where they'd been left until the hyenas' attention spans had turned to something else. Now, they were ready to get back against the three who tried to take over their kingdom. But how did they decide to take revenge?
11112111.title: Simba and Nala returned.

111121112.content:
Simba and Nala quickly ran in front of the hyenas, whose weight gain had prevented them from being able to reach the leaves any more, also leaving them helpless to prevent their enemies from eating the leaves themselves. There were still plenty left, more than any of the hyenas or Timon and Pumbaa had managed to eat, and the lions took advantage. They ate quickly and ferociously, gulping down as many as possible. After a few moments, the king and queen of the jungle rapidly began to grow outward in every direction, becoming thousand-pound behemoths in no time, then eclipsing that mark.

Eventually, each lion weighed nearly a ton, more than three times bigger than the hyenas...
111121112.title: Eat the leaves

choices: Simba Starts Off and Quickly takes the lead...
Pumba  Starts Off and Quickly takes the lead...
Timon Starts Off and Quickly takes the lead...
112.content:
The hunter smiles. The three walked right into his trap. Hidden quietly in the bushes he watches them. All zoos seem to have a lion, meercat or warthog so he decided to be different. He's going to capture, THE FATTEST meercat, lion and warthog ever found.

The three meanwhile were none the wiser, the teenage Simba was the first to notice the sign posted about the milkshake drinking contest, dragging the other two along, eh wanted to prove to Timon that even he could be a bigger pig then Pumba. Before them lay 3 large canisters filled to the brim with the shakes, and a hose leading out from them…
112.title: A Trap

choices: Reincarnations of our Guardians!" (feeding, pampering, etc)
114.content: One day when Pumbaa and Timon go exploring through the jungle when they see a strange village hidden deep within the jungle who they haven't seen before. They amble on the outskirts of the jungle trying to see if the new tribe was hostile when someone from the tribe sees them and goes over to welcome them to the village. At first Pumbaa and Timon hide in the bushes, but when the tribe doesn't appear hostile they come out of hiding and go into the friendly looking village. They go around and look at all the mouthwatering food that is so abundant in their tribe. They go up and meet the cheif who greets them, saying "Welcome...
114.title: The Ubafata

115.content:
Timon and Pumbaa are walking through a jungle looking for bugs when they decide to split up and look different ways. Timon watches as Pumbaa walks in his direction and grins. His plan was to find as many bugs as he can and eat them all himself.
Nearby was an old looking house were an old witch lives. She is brewing something and her main ingredient is a very fat meerkat. On the lookout she sees Timon and schemes out a plan.
She magically makes bugs appear near her home were Timon can see them.
Timon follows the bait and sees the old witch. Timon who is oblivious as usual asks her were he can get more bugs.
She invites him in her home and opens a door to a room full of bugs. Thousands and thousands of bugs. Timon drools at the sight. He cannot believe his luck. The witches scheme was working. A fattened meerkat she wanted and a fattened meerkat she was going to get.
Hours went by, the bugs had...
115.title: Timon Gets His Just Desserts!!!

choices: The Witch is Revealed to Be a Gigantic Bug Queen
1151.content:
Timon's lithe body had disappeared, and in it's place sat a massive lump of furred flesh. He opened his cavernous mouth and stuffed one last handful of the best bugs he'd ever had into his mouth, slobbering over his thick paw, savoring each of his sausage-like fingers and chomping messily on the live creatures. After a nice loud gulp he let out a gasious belch, a pleased smile rested on his overweight face. His fat legs kicked as he attempted to adjust himself, his belly oozing all over the ground.

"What does a guy have-ta do to get some dessert around here?" Timon bellowed in a deepened voice, he sloshed and looked around, noticing a few insects crawling around his furry cellulite, between his fat rolls, he looked absolutely giddy as he dug through his own disgusting bulk to pull the live snacks free and slurping them down. Timon had become a blob of his former self, his arms were covered in thick rolls, his neck carried several folds of flesh that rivaled his sides. His rear sagged and oozed as much as his belly did. The stripes that lined his back were almost like perverted landing strips on the hills that lined his back. He'd also aquired a nice crew of circling flies as well, particularly around his obese tail and rear end. If he could maneuver fast enough he'd have added each one to his bulk.

"So how 'bout it lady?" Timon demanded, slapping at his fat belly. "I'm still hungry!"

The Witch simply cackled and obliged, with a few spoken spells the floor shook, and from cracked wood came the biggest and nastiest looking bugs yet. Each was as plump as any insect could be, their abdomens holding so much squishy goodness...and Timon saw just that, his eyes lit up and he felt giddy all over again. Dessert was going to be excellent...
1151.title: made Timon extremely obese

choices: ...Stop the flow of bugs and prepare the brew.
...engorge Timon untill he absolutely cannot  eat another bug.
11511.content:
The blob of lard filled meerkat couldn't resist. Once those bugs were in his grasp he shoveled them in, gorging himself as if he hasn't eaten in months. He made himself as much of a pig as Pumbaa was, and more! More soft fat formed on his already blobby frame. His body continued to slowly spread out around him, any hope of mobility gone.

The witch watched, a smirk plastered across her face. Her plan was working perfectly. She made sure the meerkat would fatten up quickly. Her chants contained special fattening spells that made sure to increase fat production quickly to anyone who ate her food. Now that Timon had no chance of running, let alone waddle away, the witch knew she would have her brew, and a lot of it!

Timon, oblivious to the witches plans, gorged himself eagerly. These insects seemed to have no end. Desert seemed to be as big as the main course, perhaps more so than before. He was gaining weight much faster this time around too. He belched loudly, slobber running down his maw. By now, his fatty legs have been consumed by the mass of lard above them. His gut spread out in front of him, and his rump behind him like two massive beds. Rolls upon rolls covered the furred landscape. Timon's one chin now became 10 chins, plus many neck rolls, almost engulfing his head. It was quite a sight watching the meerkat continuously scarf down every bug in his grasp.

The witch cackled evilly. Her victim was playing into her plans perfectly. She finally decided...
11511.title: A big desert for a big meerkat.

choices: The Bugs Go Marching One By One, Hurrah!  Hurrah!
115112.content:
She twiddled her fingers and spoke more of the spell for these "dessert bugs" to continue appearing. She'd not anticipated such a willing victim, Timon was becoming a foul monstrous blob, and she couldn't be more excited. As a few of the insects crawled past her ankles she stepped out of the room, deciding now was as good a time as any to tend to the brew's workings. Perhaps she was going to get more than she bargained for.

Timon's grotesque bulk wobbled and sloshed about, his plump face dripped saliva and bug goop as he chomped on another juicy bug. "THIS is the life! I haven't had bugs this delicious in...I don't think ever!" He suckled his fat sausage-like fingers and belched wetly, Timon's plump tongue slipping across his lips. He couldn't believe the luck he was having, and strangely enough, the insects weren't running away like normal, in fact they seemed to be helping themselves up his flab and to his mouth. Blissful ignorance kept Timon enthralled at the girth of some of the bugs as they appeared from under his fat rolls, coated in his sweat. His flesh seemed alive, quivering as they worked their way from every inch of his body, some from between his rear and tail, some under his thick chin folds, it was a sickening sight for most...but for Timon, he'd died and gone to Meerkat Heaven! "Oh if Pumbaa could see me now...BEEEUURRRRP!"

A trio of the plump, beetle-like insects had positioned themselves around Timon's fat mouth, working their legs between his lips and forcing his maw open. He eyed the bugs curiously, but by this point he wasn't quite nimble enough to make the movement to swipe them away. Soon, though, nearly all of the insects had gathered on top of his enormous body, forming a line from an unknown origin past his horizon rivalling gut. Timon's eyes looked over his beachballed cheeks at one of the largest bugs in the room, a juggernaut of bugdom, bigger than Timon's fat head, and it was working its way up his chins until it was staring Timon in the face. It clacked and twiddled its mouth parts at Timon before turning around, exposing it's enormous abdomen and sliding it between Timon's lips (with the help of the trio) and resting it on his tongue. Timon's mouth gushed with drool, it was DARING him to eat it!

The insect rubbed it's thick lower body in Timon's mouth, teasing and tantalizing the near shapeless meerkat. Without another thought Timon obliged and bit down with all his might. He felt the abdomen explode in his mouth, and it was amazing. The bug was split in two, slimey bug guts coated Timon's mouth, chins, nose, and as if on cue Timon opened his mouth and let his tongue wrap the rest of the juggernaut insect and dragged it into his fat face, crunching it up, snorting and looking at all the bugs as they watched him back. Timon felt himself mentally floating from the taste sensation, and in that instant his body swelled and distended all over, rolls of sweaty furry flab slapped against the walls and rolled on top of itself, bugs getting trapped and tossed into the air as the meerkat ballooned and grew, flesh filling the room tight. Timon's tail had become nothing more than a fat knob that barely rose from between hilly butt cheeks. His arms swelled, looking as though they'd burst from their furred casing before more of the bulk swallowed them, Timon was seemingly totally helpless. It was the magical bug's cue, and they marched to their destiny in Timon's stomach...
115112.title: ...engorge Timon untill he absolutely cannot  e...

choices: Enlarge the bugs and have them force their way in much faster.
Cast a spell to make Timon feel ubelevably stuffed to breaking point.
1151121.content:
With his arms filled and heavy with wobbly fat, they became too heavy for him to move. Timon panted tiredly but still wanted more. As if on cue, the insects began to march up his humongous fleshy gut and into his salivating, mouth. He welcomed them with his gaping maw. He let many pile in before crunching down on them, their bug guts oozing with flavor and dripping down his maw. By now his many neck rolls and chins were sticky from his meal.

"UUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRP!!" Timon belched, his body quivering. He was such a fat slob, but he loved every minute of it. Who cares if he was disgustingly obese, as long as he could eat as much as he wanted, whenever he wanted, it was just fine by him. Not to mention his new flabby bulk was kinda enjoyable to him.

The witch peeked in to see how her fatty victim was doing. She was surprised to see he was filling the room rather tightly. Before he could bust out of the room, she quickly chanted some spells and in an instant, the walls around the monstrous meerkat seemed to spread farther apart. Timon's cellulite flab flopped from the walls to the ground, now more space for him to grow, but by how much? Timon was still voraciously gorging himself on the bugs. The witched wondered how someone so small could eat so much and still continue to grow. She was growing a bit impatient, even though she enjoyed stuffing this meerkat to immobility and then some. "Just how much can he eat," she thought. She decided...
1151121.title: The Bugs Go Marching One By One, Hurrah!  Hurrah!

11511211.content:
"I'll show that gluttonous oaf!" the witch grumbled to herself, and with a few more magical words sent into the air, the insects stopped and began to glow, they clacked and chattered and as if to mimic the obese meerkat they began growing. Each one became more swollen and overall much larger creatures in appearance, the largest was easily the size of Simba in his adulthood. Timon's eyes bulged from his sockets as he stared at the monsterous bugs, they were practically fighting, crawling maddeningly all over one another to get to his mouth!

The massive bugs took only a handful of steps on the quivering land-mass of Timon's gut to reach the meerkat's mouth, the first bug stuffed it's body into Timon's mouth, stretching it wider than anything Timon was used to...he appeared as a snake swallowing an ostrich egg, he attempted to bite down, but it seemed pointless, the insect was stuffing itself down Timon's throat, his whole head looking ballooned and distended. His eyes clenched in pain, and before he even had his lips around the bug's rear end, another massive juicy bug had begun to pry Timon's mouth open and stuff itself in after it's commrade. Timon's entire head took on the bulbous shape of an over-ripe melon, each bug squirmed and worked it's way into his belly before it felt as if they'd exploded inside of him. Timon belched louder than before, the room shook as drool and bug slime pouring from his mouth and coated his fat rippled front. Timon sat, goop dripping from his snout as he noticed the bugs appeared to be getting further and further away...

But no, Timon was merely growing AGAIN, his body distended not only outward, but upward too, his rear end grew higher until he could see each cheek and his dinky plump knob of a tail, and his own belly reaching higher than anything he'd seen before. The stripes on his back had become larger and lighter now, his fur becoming stretched so far on endless rolls. His head was located in what now appeared to be a "pit" of fat rings, the lowest spot in the center of the Timon land mass. His cheeks hung well past his mouth and bunched up around the corners of the pit, slobber dribbled from his mouth as he watched the monster bugs leaping into the feeding pit. As a couple more bugs stretched his lips over their bodies Timon's body groaned and sloshed, his butt blubber shook and vibrated and an enormous fart billowed out, the wind coating the insects and filling the air. His body dripped with sweat from the heat increase in the room, as a few more gasious releases exploded from the meerkat. Timon could only think momentarily how he could rival Pumbaa with ease. His head swollen grotesquely large with three of the bugs inside his mouth, crawling down his esophogus, the oblivious meerkat only thought of how they could use some salt...

The witch groaned and spat, this blob was going to be the size of the planet before things were said and done, he'd eat himself into eternity given the chance!
11511211.title: Enlarge the bugs and have them force their way ...

choices: Let the spell wear off sooner or later.
One last spell.  (You decide what it does!)
115112111.content:
Unknowingly to the witch, she was loosing control of her magic. The bugs continued to swell and force their way inside Timon, without her chanting any spells. She never would have predicted her victim would be such a fat slob. What started out as a plot for fattening a victim for a brew has become a race to save her house from this tub of lard.

It was a while before she noticed she was loosing control. She tried desperately to undo the magic, but to no avail. The insects seemed to be acting to their own accord. They crawled and clawed their way into Timon, stuffing themselves inside this slobby meerkat. The witch began to panic. Timon was filling the room with sweaty flab, quickly reaching the walls. The witch tried to expand the room again, but the room could only be enlarged so much. Her previous spells were using up too much of her magic. Timon's blubbery butt finally broke through one of the walls. His constant flatulence filling new rooms. His enourmous gut managed to break through another.

All hope was lost for the witch, she abandoned her plans and decided to flee. Slowly she watched her house begin to crumble. She couldn't believe this was happening. She angrily watched, thinking what to do, only a little magic left...
115112111.title: The Witch's Plans Backfire

1151121112.content:
"So, you want to be a fat slob? Well then a fat slob you will be for eternity!"

The witch angrily chanted one last spell. Timon didn't know it but the witch placed a curse on him. His current size now became his permanent weight. It was his punishment for literally eating the witch out of house and home. The spell also altered one thing. The insects began behaving more erratic.

The witch walked up to the gargantuan meerkat and explained his fate.

"You fat slob! I have placed a curse on you. Since you are a glutton, I feel this form suits you best. I have made it so you can never loose any of that weight! You will be stuck as a morbidly obese meerkat for the rest of your life! I also added one little thing. These insects will continue to force their way into you by any means. You will constantly be fed and stuffed, as is your punishment. Also, any one who gets near you or tries to help you, will suffer the same fate as you."

The witch laughed maniacally. Timon could only listen helplessly as he learned of his fate. He could not say a word as the bugs stuffed into his stretched mouth. He noticed something else. The insects were acting more aggressive than they were before. They seemed to swarm over him, looking for a way in. They soon found one in Timon's "back door."

The bugs began to huddle behind Timon's gaseous rear and force their way under and between his monstrous butt cheeks. He shivered as they squeezed their way in, determined to find a way inside. The first bug to reach his tailhole was just as large as the one's forcing their way in his maw. The insect, forced and clawed his way inside, stretching the meerkat's rear. The next bug followed suit and so on.

The witch laughed again. "One last thing. There is a way to undo this curse, however only my sister or I can. Considering I have no plans of undoing it, your only hope is my sister. But they way you are now, the only way she can help you is if you become visible form space! That or you can somehow chant the spell to undo the curse, but...fat chance! Heehehehe!"

The witch prepared to take her leave, letting out one last laugh before she departed, leaving the blob behind...
1151121112.title: The Curse

choices: Pumbaa is Attacked By the Bugs/Eat Up!
11511211121.content:
The witch's cackle echoed through Timon's head, how could something so innocent as a bug buffet turn into THIS? His eyes felt like they were going to be forced from their sockets as he felt one of the massive beetles stuff its way into his nostril, stretching his nose to hilarious proportions. He felt the bug burst inside of his head, filling it like a balloon with goop, and soon he had bugs on either side of his tiny ears, stretching the canals large enough and sliding inside. Timon's head was swollen so grotesquely large, he felt like it would pop like a zit. BLOOSH! Bug guts squirted from his ears and out his nostrils as the large insects spilled themselves inside the meerkat, his head deflating into it's still bloated fat form.

Timon's body grew and grew and distorted further, countless folds of his furred flesh oozed out the windows of the building until a muffled CRACKOOM! sent the walls collapsing outward, the ceiling debris fell into Timon's flab and was quickly swallowed up by the ballooning flesh. Timon looked like a tick, feeding off the planet itself, there he sat amongst the jungle trees, pulsating and covered in large beetles digging around his flab. He opened his mouth and moaned in the most miserable of gutteral noises. Thick drool spilled from his mouth, merely allowing the bugs to lube themselves up as they jumped down his gullet. With nearly every breath that Timon was allowed to make, his body would swell larger, fat folds collapsing upon themselves and creating new fat masses in a perverted mockery of continental creation. His sense of up and down was lost, his body sloshed one way and he felt his intestines fill painfully tight...

A massive fart sent several of the more pervasive insects through the air, limbs of trees blew and snapped off. Timon's tailhole flexed and finished gassing the unlucky land, but he actually felt a moment of inner-relaxation. Timon's head oozed from a thick fold of his own body and he looked over his fat cheeks, light, colors, what was it?

"Timon!"

"Oh Timon I'd been looking everywhere for you!"

He knew that voice...Pumbaa? "Puhm...blagh...BLURRRP..." What did the witch say? "Suffer the same fate?" "PUMBBLAH...BLOOO! BLOGH AWBLAY! BLELP!" thick, viscous strands of saliva spilled from Timon's mouth just before an insect clicked angrily entering his line of sight, and soon his mouth was stuffed with the fattest insect he'd had in hours. The only noise afterward was a low-rumbling bit of flatulence from the meerkat blob.

Pumbaa stared at his once tiny friend in surprise...he and Timon were no strangers to gorging themselves shapeless...but...something was odd. "Timon! What's the matter? I can't tell you the places I've looked! I..." the warthog snorted and watched as a very large insect shoved itself into his moaning friend's mouth. "You found dinner already Timon! Oh yay! Yay! Yay!!" He nose-prodded his fat friend, noting to step back as Timon's bulk oozed like lava, folding on itself and easily could have coated the warthog's face in mere moments. "Ehhh say, Timon, are you okay? You must have really found a good nest this time! That's my buddy!" Pumbaa watched as insects seemed to appear from Timon's flab rolls, almost from nowhere... "Oh boy, oh boy! I'm so hungry!" Pumbaa smacked his lips and let his tongue slide out of his mouth, drool spattering the ground.

Timon's pulsating and growth stopped suddenly. Bugs poked their mandibles out from under his flab and stared down at Pumbaa. The clueless hog stared back up at his infested friend, hunger in his eyes, and the bugs knew it. "PUMBLAH! MAGIC BUGS! WITCH! GET HEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEL-UUUUUURRRRRRRRRRUUUUURRRRRP!"
11511211121.title: Pumbaa returns to find Timon

choices: Pumbaa ignores his curiosity and continues to feast.
Pumbaa begins to worry when the bugs pile in faster.
115112111211.content:
The hungry pig looked up at his enormous buddy. The insects chattered, eyeing the warthog as their next target. Bugs began pouring out of Timon's flab, rolls, and crevaces. He looked as though he was the nest filled with bugs, and that wouldn't be too far form the truth at the moment.

Pumbaa could have sworn Timon said something about magic bugs before his belch.

"Boy Timon, their all over you! You really hit the jackpot on this one!" Pumbaa began to salivate, his hunger getting the best of him. The insects began rushing the unknowing warthog, swarming him in and instant. Pumbaa was a little surprised as the insects pried his mouth open and began marching inside. His dreams had come true! For once the bugs were coming to him. He gladly offered no resistance as he sat stupidly, mouth gaping.

"NO PUMBRUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUPPPP!!! ITS A TR--. " The meerkat was cut short as one humongous bug stuffed itself in his mouth, preventing any warning from escaping him.

Timon could only barely watch over his rolls of fat and blubber as his naive friend fell victim to the witche's curse. He moaned defeatedly, knowing his pal will share his same fate.

Already Pumbaa's gut was swelling from the bugs, first becoming slightly pudgy, then hanging more and more as they filled him, moving and growing slowly in front of him like a brown furred blob. Still, Pumbaa couldn't help but wonder where they all were coming from...
115112111211.title: Stuffing the pig.

choices: Pumbaa Farts More, Destroying the Magic Insects
Pumbaa Farts More, The Insects Adapt - BIG Time
1151121112111.content:
"Oh...MMPH...boy, oh bo-mmpphhmm-oy!" Pumbaa managed to spit out those couple words before several dozen of the beetle-like insects shoved their way into his porcine mouth, clacking and chattering away. Pumbaa just rolled back, spreading his arms and legs and allowed the bugs to crawl right in.

"That Timon!" he thought, "He sure is a great friend! He's trained this nest of gooey, yummy, delicious bugs to crawl right into our mouths!" Pumbaa thought jovially. He managed to look over the horde of insects crawling over his swelling mountain of a gut and to the once-lithe meerkat...Timon was reaching grotesque proportions at this point, his body showing almost no shape but that of a amorphous blob, fat rolls had bunched up in various spots, his face had become spread out and buried by his massive cheeks, his tuft of red hair spouting above a knob of fat on top. "That's just like my Timon! Getting in a good feast!"

Pumbaa was overjoyed at his body's progress as he allowed the bugs to do their work, his arms and legs had swollen and plumped to appear like balloon animals. His belly had distended and slapped against the ground, pulling him upright once more, every goop-filled bug added more pounds to his body, and soon he was rounding up entirely. Even his long and thin tail had fattened up to the size of a elephant's trunk, bending it was not an option any longer. So much bulk was being forced onto Pumbaa's chunky frame that it began giving him a hunchbacked appearance. Pumbaa closed his fat mouth, crunching a dozen of the insects and feeling their gut-filled bodies explode, sending drool and goop splattering down his chins and fat belly mass.

"Mmmm-mmm! These ARE delicious Timon! BLEEEEEEEEEEEEEUUUUUUUUUUURP!" a hefty pile of slobber sputtered from the porker's drool coated lips, a quick slurp and another belch released and Pumbaa thought he was in Heaven. Pumbaa's body continued growing, each bug causing Pumbaa to swell and thicken in every directon, rising higher and higher until the pig was just as big as Timon. Soon a mass of insects joined together around Pumbaa's rear end and began to lift him forward, just as with Timon, several insects began to invade Pumbaa's rear end, sliding under his fat tail and between sweaty, furry cheeks.

"OHH...I...wouldn't do thaaat....BUUURP...UUUUUURP....BUURUUUURP" Pumbaa winced and grimaced as his nerves began to take over, his guts began rumbling...

A number of the bugs were blasted back as Pumbaa's explosive flatulence ripped forth, debris and insects alike flying back from the pungant gas. Pumbaa oozed back into place, any remaining bugs holding him up were crushed by his rear end. "I warned you..." he said, embarrassed as could be, thick bug guts still dripping from his snout. The insects blown back, those that hadn't smashed into a tree or rock, all clacked and rolled around, seemingly in pain, legs furiously waving in the air until...each one began swelling up. None of them reached the sizes of the meerkat and warthog, but they grew larger and rounder than any of the fat insects had looked before, their carapaces snapped and tore, their abdomens appeared clear before...BAM! SPLAT! SPLIK! Each one exploded leaving gut stains on the ground.
1151121112111.title: Pumbaa ignores his curiosity and continues to f...

choices: The Witch, her plan foiled, came back.
11511211121111.content:
*Frrt* "Oh, excuse me!", Pumbaa said with some embarrassment. Peering over his flab, Timon immediately winced at the horrid smell, then noticed the exploded remains of the bugs near the flatulent warthog, as well as a noticeable lack of bugs feeding him.

"PumbUUUUUUUUUUUURUP!, you did-" Timon said before more giant beetles crammed themselves into his mouth. Timon came to the realization that if he could somehow fart with the intensity of Pumbaa, he would be free as well.

"Lesser of two evils." Timon thought as he began wiggling his flabby, furry behind. The beetles, sensing his rhythms, began to divide themselves between both orifices, disappearing in his mouth and between his butt cheeks. "It's woOOOOOOOOOOOURP-king!" Timon said, right before a loud rumble emanated from his stomach.

*FRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRT*

Timon farted with a power similar to, and possibly surpassing, his porcine companion as the bugs, unable to handle the two-front battle of flatulence, began exploding both on and near Timon. "We did I-" Timon was cut off by the smell of his massive fart. "Uuuuuuugh!"

"I can't believe you, Timon! All this grub, and you had to mess it up!" An ignorant Pumbaa stated right before...
11511211121111.title: Pumbaa Farts More, Destroying the Magic Insects

choices: Their growth seems to level off.  The bugs keep them at a constant weight.
11511211121112.content:
FFFFRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRTT!!

Another fart bellowed from Pumbaa's rear. Bugs began bursting and falling off of their bodies. It seemed that the pig's stench was the only weakness to the insects.

"Oh yes...finally" Timon thought to himself. He was relieved to see, from what he could see over his blubberous body, that the insects were stopping and exploding.

However, the witches magic was far more powerful that some strong stench. The bugs still continued to swell and grow fat, but soon they stopped bursting. They began adapting to their new larger forms. All this was oblivious to Timon who was already much relieved to think their plight was over.

Pumpaa however, was a bit disappointed. To him, this was glutton heaven. All you could eat all the time, and to food that feeds itself to you. What else could anyone want?

To his enjoyment, he felt the insects swarm over him again, and to his amazement, much bigger too! "BRUUUURUUUUUP! Oh...Timon, get ready for another round! BUUUUUUURP!"

The first group of the large insects began to swarm over them both. They crowded around both morbidly obese blob's rears and squeezed their way in between their massive cheeks.

Timon's eyes widened in disbelief. How could they survive that horrible smell! All seemed lost to him, before his thoughts quickly focused on the bugs invading his rear again.

This time, there was a lot more insects than the both of them ever thought imaginable. Forcing their way into both their rears. Keeping them both equal size and same rate of fattening. Their growth seemed to increase now and showed no signs of stopping any time soon.

Pumbaa could only let the bugs do their thing, blushing a bit at the way they were being "fed". "Oh...Looks like we can BUUUUUUUUUUUUURP! ...give our mouths a rest for a bit..." he said, panting heavily. His large weight now proving to make even the simplest task of talking a chore. Slobber oozed from his mouth as he talked and breathed. Every so often, explosive flatulence escaped his rear, often times from Timon as well.

It looked like this was to be their fate for the rest of their lives...
11511211121112.title: Round 2

115112111211121.content: It was their fate. And they accepted this fact. Once they had accepted their fate, the ever expanding duo began to enjoy it. They began devouring the bugs faster and faster. They ballooned ever faster and faster as well. Before long, the too had covered all of the pride lands. As they expanded, they continued to have shall we say gas problems, Pumbaa especially. Clouds of toxic gas blew all around killing off anything that breathed it in. The bugs however, were unaffected, and even began to pick up the bodies of the other animals and take them to the two massive blobs of flesh. Timon and Pumbaa, now too obsessed with growing larger, hardly noticed as they devoured their friends and fellow animals. Still the bugs swarmed over the two obese buddies, and they grew and grew and grew. Soon the two covered the entire planet under their massive flab. Still the bugs did not stop to feed themselves to their masters. It seemed that as fast as the two ate the bugs, more were produced out of the sweaty rolls of their bodies. Soon Pumbaa had eaten so much that his own extremely fat body began to push Timon's up and off the planet itself. Soon Timon was forced onto the moon, leaving Pumbaa to spread his influence over the world. Never one to be outdone, Timon began willing himself to eat faster and faster. Meanwhile, Pumbaa's flesh now covered the entirety of the planet. Still he expanded larger and larger. Timon now covered the entire surface area of the moon twice over. Soon, seemingly as a strange side effect of the curse, each of the creatures' masses had absorbed the celestial body on which they sat into their thick sweaty rolls. Timon soon somehow caught up to Pumbaa. The two continued their gluttony long until they had outgrown even the galaxy that had held them up until now. Still the bugs, now about the size of solar systems themselves, fed the two monstrously obese animals. Soon the corpulent duo found themselves....
115112111211121.title: Planet Timon and Planet Pumbaa

choices: They Find the Witch & Her Sister (Small Universe!)
1151121112111211.content:
The two living planets continued their growth, expanding across the stars, feeling the regular sized planets slam into their bulk, dimple, and soon disappear seemingly into the ever-quivering flesh. About the only sign of true life Timon or Pumbaa could manage were unimaginable gasious explosions from their exposed anal openings or their distended and forever gaping mouths. The insects were the only known inhabitants and it kept their fatty flesh active to say the least.

They continued growing, like a tick that had hit the motherload of veins, neither one discernable as their former selves, just enormous gassy balls. Space dust, debris, and stars were sucked into the warthog and meerkat, a whole solar system of space was filled up by the two gigantoids in no time flat..their minds were lost to time itself.. As if by some miracle, however, the blobs had appeared in what had to be a completely new galaxy (though more likely they had simply absorbed enough old ones). Timon and Pumbaa's bloated eyes stared at almost twenty planets, and two massive suns...they knew that these would simply slam into them as so many had done before...or would they?

These weren't like anything else they'd seen, in fact, in comparison, Timon and Pumbaa appeared reletively...small! As if by fate, Timon's intestines swelled greater than before, and with a healthy BOOM of flatulence his round planet-like body shook several insects off and was spun into one of the closer planets...blue and brown in appearance, though now all a blur as he zoomed closer. Pumbaa, never one to leave his buddy forced a powerful fart from his guts and followed suit.

Like obese asteroids the two entered the new planet's atmosphere with a firey streak until ....SLAGOOOOOOOOOOOOOOM...Timon and Pumbaa had left a mile-wide crater on the planet's face. There the two sat, covered in debris in their new, and bigger, surroundings...What would they find here? What was going to happen now?
1151121112111211.title: In a new galaxy...

choices: The witches try and undo the curse and return them to normal.
The witches try and find a good use for the two blobs. Cure seems impossible.
11511211121112111.content:
The ground shook violently, the air filled with dust and debris, clouding out the sky and the suns above it. Everything around them dimmed, their massive flabby bodies shook and trembled greatly, like a constantly shaking bowl of jello. Sweat and insects shaking off them from the impact.

They both looked what they could see around them, unable to turn their massive necks; their heads sunken in and immovable. To their surprise, they could see trees in the far distance. In fact, this planet was a lot like theirs, but much much larger in comparison. In fact, by this new planet's standards, its like they restarted, barely outgrowing the forest...or whats left of it, again. Pumbaa's insides swelled and increased in pressure, his pucker tightened until a monstrous "FFFFFFFFFFFRRRRRRMMMP!" exploded from his rear. As a result, the force of the noxious air being released blew away all the lingering clouds of debris around them, reveling the sky once again.

They both sighed, knowing they would soon outgrow this planet soon as the process starts all over again...or would they?

"Oh no! Not you again!" exclaimed a voice nearby.

"Oh my, what do we have here?" said another voice.

The two blob's eyes lazily looked around them, unable to discern the direction it came from. Suddenly two women appeared in front of each. One very familiar to Timon.

"Are you kidding me?! How can you be here?! You should have burst long ago!" It was the witch from before, hovering over Timon's face. Timon's eyes widened the best they could as he saw her.

"Well I guess I know how they ended up this way." Said another woman, who was hovering in front of Pumbaa. She looked almost identical to the other witch, but looked and acted kinder.

The two witches seemed normal sized, not at all dwarfed by the two's massive size.

"I swear, I can't leave you alone for a minute before you curse helpless beings."

"Bah! This gluttonous slob destroyed my house!" Said the witch, slapping Timon's grotesque cheek.

"And now you in returne destroyed a good chunk of the universe. They must have absorbed everything if they got this far. Poor dears."

The arguing seems to go on for a bit longer before the question of what to do with them arises.
11511211121112111.title: Deja Vu

115112111211121111.content:
Timon and Pumbaa sat there, nearly motionless in their originally endless bulk. A messy sounding bubble of flatulence erupted from Timon's wide bottom, making even Pumbaa blush with embarrassment.

"Let's burst them like balloons!"

"Poppycock, they've done enough damage, just let them be for once!"

"You're too soft!"

"You're too mean!"

"My HOUSE!"

"You've got PLENTY of houses!"

"FINE!"

"FINE!"

Pumbaa's belly rumbled and his body oozed forward as more fat cells multiplied under his flesh. "Uh...e-e-excuse me...nice ladies?"

"WHAT!?" They both shrieked at the blobs. Pumbaa would have sunk back if he could make any motion whatsoever. "Gosh I'm REALLY sorry for anything we did...but could you help us out?" Pumbaa smiled stupidly, quickly adding "We'll be your best friends!" Timon merely rolling his eyes inside that gelatinous head of his.

At this the angry witch folded her arms and snorted. "Pathetic...FINE...but the stinky one gets helped first!" To which the witches looked at one another - "Which one's the stinky one?" they said in unison, then bursting into cackles and slapping their knees in mid air. Timon grumbled profusely, a lumpy fart merely dampening his mood. "But seriously...the pig...HE was nice enough to apologize!" she spat in Timon's direction.

"NATSO FATSO!" The good witch zapped Pumbaa's body, which wobbled violently, a few blurts of gas escaping as his body appeared to be stretched and pulled from the inside, as if...something was inside of him...

Pumbaa's mouth opened up wide, wider than even he thought it could go, and out arose a sickly white, wet, gelatine-esque hoofed arm. Pumbaa's eyes were wide with fright, and Timon's eyes bulged as much as they could from his fat-laden sockets. With a few wet SLORP, SHLOP, BLORP sounds Pumbaa's form deflated, sending the bulbous white mass forward, discarding Pumbaa's fleshy form like some disgusting insect would It hit the ground with a splat, where it lay for a moment, sloshing around like Pumbaa had been minutes before. As the mass stirred and lifted itself up, it quickly became apparent that this thing was the spitting image of Pumbaa! It's wet form glistenend in the sunlight, and by this fact, appeared to be rather translucent, though its eyes had a glowing appearance to them, something Timon found unsettling.

"Ee hee hee, a Fat Golem!" the evil witch snickered. "Clever, I wouldn't have thought you'd figure out a proper counter-curse!"

"You're simple!" the good sister rang out, looking over the colossal, and disgusting blob. "Just had to collect up the cursed cells and bring 'em out!" As she spoke, Pumbaa seemed to stir, blinking, looking around, and then at himself...he was back to normal again!...Mostly! He was the polar opposite of his previous form, appearing quite emaciated. "Uh oh..." he grunted as he collapsed again, the whole ordeal having taken a toll on him.

"Now then, YOUR turn tubbs!" the evil witch glared at Timon and pitched a magical shock that hit Timon square in the gut sending him rolling backwards until he slowed to a stop on his back. His heft rose in the air as he gurgled to breathe, knowing what to expect he opened his mouth, wanting this nightmare to end at last. The witch, of course, had other plans for Timon.

His flesh gurgled and surged, the Golem inside forming and pushing around for an exit...and it found one. Timon's eyes again squeezed from behind fatty sockets as his rear opening began to stretch as if he was having the largest bowel movement of his life. SHHHHHLORP...FLARP...SPLECH...FRRRRAP. In the end, Timon was as mortified as he was twig-looking, his anal opening gave way to the birth of his own fat-celled twin, and somehow, the jiggling Timon-Golem was just as unimpressed, and looking just as annoyed at the situation.

"Ahh, he is fine. He can go to the bathroom much more easily now. Mwehehehe!"

"Thats just awful"

As the two witches argued amongst themselves again, Timon and Pumbaa took time to regather themselves. They stood up slowly, staggering a bit as having all that fat crawl out of them can drain anyone.

"Oooh...Timon. I can walk again!"

"Same here buddy. Ow...my rear.." He said, rubbing it.

Neither group payed much attention to the golems, which seemed to be snacking on some of the forest trees, still having the endless appetite Timon and Pumbaa once had...or so they though. Both Timon and Pumbaa stomachs suddenly began to ache and growl, as if they hadn't eaten in ages.

"Oooh so hungry!" Pumbaa complained.

The two golems stopped their munching after hearing these words and stomp-wobbled their way over two their hosts.

"Sooo. our little buddies are hungry again huh" Timon-Golem spoke with a deeper voice than the original. He grabs Timon with his lard paw and brings him to his face. "Maybe I should crawl back inside you and make you eat endlessly again?" The golem smirked. He then grabbed Pumbaa with his other lard hand and held him up. "Or perhaps Both of us should crawl inside one of you. You'd be the fattest thing alive."

"Or maybe, why don't we stuff them and make them our size again. Four fat lard-blobs ruling this planet." Golem-Pumbaa suggested. "Or perhaps use them to make more of us. Our own lard factories."

Timon-Golem smirked at this. He liked these ideas a lot. but which to choose? And what about those arguing witches. Surely they would foil their plans. Maybe make a deal with them?, Try and trap them? Quite the conundrum.

At the moment though, it looked like the witches were too involved with themselves to notice anything. They could just waddle away from them and get their plans underway. So they took their opportunity and "snuck" away as best as two massive blobs could into the forest.

Just then, Timon began to think differently. He actually began to WANT the bugs! He began to WANT to grow fatter and fatter! It seemed that the golems had taken over his mind! They decided to manipulate Timon to....

Timon, no longer in control of his actions, watched as his mountainous sack of flesh that was his arm reached outward, his fingers, themselves nothing but small blobs of fat, closing around the thin body of Pumbaa. Timon's conscious mind was outraged by what he had just done. How could he have actually eaten his best friend?! Did his gluttony really know no bounds at all?! Pumbaa, having stretched Timon's stomach to the max, was cramped inside his fat friend's organs.

"Ooohhh.h......I have such a stomach ache...." Timon whined.

121.content:
Pumbaa was infamously known for his gas problems. Whenever he couldn't hold it in, the result were often known to even incapacitate entire herds. However, the boar felt the need to molify the problem and after much searching, he attained a pill that would cease the gas problems and Pumbaa was more than happy to make his friends happy.

Returning to his and Timon's forest, the boar settled in and looked at the box. He had difficulty reading the warning and he considered asking for Timon's help for it. But his friend was busy with some project or another and would be annoyed with the interruption. Pumbaa didn't like intruding on his friend's work, but if the pill had a major side effects he needed to hear about...
121.title: The Pill

1211.content:
Pumbaa grunted and decided against it, he used his tusks and tore through the box that lay before him and soon he was holding up the bottle of pills. "Oh boy, oh boy!" he said gleefully and without another word Pumbaa popped the top and swallowed several of the pills. He let the all-but-empty bottle fall to the ground and smacked his lips, knowing he should get something to drink to help the pills do their work. "Gee, I wonder how long these things take to work?" He pondered aloud, but without so much as a tail swat, he was off waddling towards the water hole.

Once at the lush watering spot he dipped his mouth into the cool water and gulped and gulped and gulped, letting the liquid swell his stomach and help dissolve the pills within. Suddenly he felt an all-too familiar rumbling within his belly. He moaned and looked around in embarrassment, letting his tail go high into the air and waited for the expulsion....his stomach gurgled and rumbled again...and still no flatulence. Pumbaa's eyes went wide with happiness. "They work!"

"What works?"

Pumbaa jumped, looking back at Timon, standing with a surprisingly large net full of squirming bugs. "Uhhhhh....nothing Timon...nothing at all!" he felt ingenious for that cover. "Well c'mon y'mook, *I* did all the work catching us somethin' to eat tonight, least you can do is help carry it!" Pumbaa looked overjoyed and gladly wormed his snout under the net and heaved the bugs onto his back, this was a heavy catch all right, and Pumbaa knew he'd be able to enjoy every last bug without gassy concerns.

****
Several hours had passed and the duo lay under the evening sky, on their backs and swollen to perfection, bug net emptied of it's contents to the side. Timon rubbed and massaged his rounded middle, his cheeks bulged and a booming belch forced it's way from his open mouth. "Phew, that...was excellent... Hey Pumbaa, I haven't heard a thing outta you all day! And I don't just mean your mouth..." he prodded his porcine friend in his ripe gut. Pumbaa moaned as he adjusted his belly, attempting to speak but finding it difficult. He'd eaten so much, he'd hardly noticed the lack of gas blowing from his rear...or his front. Pumbaa's gut gurgled and rumbled though, Timon could even hear that. "Are you okay Pumbaa??" Timon sloshed his belly to the side, scratching along it's rounded length. "Uhh...mmph...I'm fine Timon...m...maybe I'm just ...better...now..." Pumbaa's words were filled with almost pained uncomfortableness.

"Better? What are ya sick'r'somethin'?" He followed his question up with a sickly wet belch.

Pumbaa didn't want to talk. He grumbled, though he'd excused the feelings while he ate, now that he sat there digesting he could feel the pressures inside of him building up, he wanted to explode. More than anything, he wanted to fart. He rolled on his back, hooves rubbing at his tight gut, pressure against his tail opening, but nothing would come from it. "I...might be...ohhhhhhhhh..." Pumbaa's body shook and in two sudden surges his belly grew in size.

"Uhhh Pumbaa???" Timon managed to stand, grasping his full gut and stared at his bulging friend. "I'm ffff...ffff...fine...Tim...on..." and again his belly grew, and soon his body appearing slightly puffier all around. Pumbaa knew it had to've been the pills...he'd stopped his gas, too well.
1211.title: Pumbaa decides not to bother Timon & takes the ...

12112.content:
Timon watched wide eyed as Pumbaa became even more puffier, looking like a stuffed balloon being filled with air.

"Okay Pumbaa." he said slowly as Pumbaa gave another swell. "Now I know something's wrong. What's happening?"

"I took some pills for my gas problems." the boar replied, nervously watching his crisis. "And I think they are working now. Just in not the way I thought they would."

"What?" said Timon in a moment of incomprehension. "Well, were there any instructions with the pills?"

"Well, I think there were some instructions on the bottle I left near the watering hole." said Pumbaa. "I thought about asking you to read them, but I didn't want to bother you."

Timon rolled his eyes and left. Minutes later, he returned carrying the bottle and noted with worry that Pumbaa's swelling form had begun to round.

"Pumbaa..." he asked, an ominous silence following his inspection of the bottle. "How many pills did you take?"

"Um...all of them."

"Oh, great!" said Timon. "Now you got yourself in serious do-do. Pardoning the pun."


Pumbaa simply gave him a puzzled look and TImon sighed and began read.

"Warning: Do not take all of the pills at once. Side effects include-" And he listed them all off, finally reaching to, "and most dangerously, a building up of the gasses that would not make you stop swelling for days."

"FOR DAYS?!" Pumbaa yelped as his form inflated more. "I can't last days at this rate Timon! If this keeps coming I'm going to explode!"

"Yeah, and bring in the end of the world as we know it." he muttered. Catching his friend's terrified gaze, he said quickly, "Don't worry though, that won't happen. I have a plan."

125.title: Free Choice - Fork in the Road

1251.content:
(The following is from a guest, I will break the story up and allow for new additions, but, will also post leads to complete the short story too)

"And I'm telling ya puhmba," Timon was saying before he had to gasp for air. "There ain't no way you can out chili this here meerkat." He pointed at his chest, his finger sinking into the mound in front of him.
"Oh is that so?" pumbaa replied, sounding offended. He grunted as a high pitched fart poofed from under his tail. The wart hog's chin rested on his chest, his legs up in the air, and all the space between them was as stable as a water balloon on a truck racing down a bumpy highway. He looked over his form down to the meerkat. "And from the looks of things, I think I out chilled you!"
"Hah!" Timon coughed, slapping his belly as it shook like jello and making his innards grow sea sick. He then pushed a finger deep into his belly, twisting the flesh like spaghetti on a form, and grinned as a low, juicy fart was released. "Not this Monday!"
"It's Tuesday."
"Like I said, this Monday," Timon replied. He burped, sending a ripple down his overly bloated flesh. His belly threatened to swallow the base of his tail.

"But..." Pumbaa grumbled, realized that there was no point in arguing. "Then I'll out after chili you!" The wart hog rolled onto his side as his belly took a few minutes to catch, rumbling and trembling, shaking his tail and thighs. He grunted and wiggled, and finally a long, gaseous release made his tail flap and his thighs sting.
"Gah!" Timon waved a hand in front of his nose, coughing repeatedly. "If you're gonna play dirty, then you're on!" He wiggled as though running in place from his back. The arms went up and down, the legs squirmed form side to side, and the rest of his body was a disturbed mound of jello. PHFFRAAAPT!" "Hah! Take that one Puhmba!"
"Whew! Do you feel a draft?" Timon asked. Several patches of fur had blow off his lower regioons from that, leaving bare, stinging flesh.
"Oooh! I'd plug you up if I knew what was good for you!" Pumbaa said, his brow narrowing. He rocked from side to side, unable to do much else, no matter how much his legs kicked. "You're luck I can't get over th-" -PHFRIBBITT.
"And you're lucky I can't get over THERE!" Timon snapped.
The meerkat rolled onto his belly, his tail in the air, and his sides pressing out several inches. As he wagged his tail, he farted again, and did his best to aim at Pumbaa. "I don't play to lose!" he taunted, feeling a burning build up in his guts. Pumbaa did the same, his body shaking as he breathed heavily. His innards were like a chemistry project, boiling and percolating, waiting for someone to stop it before there was an explosion. Phft PHFT PTITITITRAP SQUEALPPPHFTT! "Take that!" he snapped, his voice cracking from being so worked up

Pumbaa's stinging anus was like a disturbed drum head as a second round of assaults flew forth, now exploding so quickly that he had trouble catching his breath.
Timon looked green in the face, even with all his fur. He clasped a paw over his muzzle and returned the volley, although this was more from how sick he felt than from an attempt to fight back. His body bounced in place, still very much like a water balloon, for several seconds afterward. When he tried to talk his voice went up and down, like a child bouncing on his father's knee. He then rolled closer to Pumbaa as the wide stripes on his back stretched and squished from the movements. He grabbed a nearby rock, grunting and straining as he hefted it into the air, and then placing it on his belly. The weight sent the gasses out at a rapid pace. "Haha!" he called. "I haven't lost yet. Take that! And that! And THAT!" PHHRAAABITTYPHFT. It was soon difficult to tell what was a back stripe and what was a stain. "Have you had enough?!"
1251.title: Bloated with Chili

12511.content:
(Continued guest addition)

"Never!!" came a defiant reply. "Oh Timon, you're lucky a skunk can't smell his own stench, because you would have given up!" His face too looked a bit green, his eyes drooping from sea sickness. Pumbaa was too bloated to reach around for any rock. Instead he took his flailing legs and began to squeeze at his belly, grinding the knees deep into his flesh, and placing his front hooves up top to press down. More gas blew from the small opening than should have been possible, Pumbaa actually rocketed backward a few inches from the force. Meanwhile, the disturbance inside Timon began to cause more gasses to build. He could feel his all ready swollen belly tightening, and as he looked down he saw the stone rise up, his belly taking on the appearance of an air filled balloon. "Urgh," he moaned, holding it. Suddenly the rock sprung off and he managed to squeeze out a few more expulsions. He could feel the gasses building at a frantic pace. "You're in for it now!" Timon called, though he was indeed growing a bit worried. His body ballooned further, and even after several more ass stinging farts, it seemed to do no good. His body was tight and round, and only swelling further, he could feel his flesh creaking and straining.

Pumbaa quickly developed the same problem. He watched in horror as his hooves rose into the air above his expanding belly. Only moments later, he could see nothing in front of him but the brown further gut. He tightly squeezed his knees into it again, hoping for a release. PPHFAPT! PPHHFT! PT PT PT PT PT PTIPIPIPIPPHFRAAAPHT!!! The two moaned in unison as their bodies became spheres. Although they were nervous, there were still in a contest.
"Is that all you got!!" Timon snarled, throwing a clump of dirt at Pumbaa. "Here's some right back at ya!" It was as if an earthquake had shook the area from the force of the blast. Most of his backside was barren of fur, and the round meerkat sat in a sizable sink hole he had caused. The gases were so thick that they could be seen. Green and brown mist covered the area, and from behind he could hear nonstop gagging. "You can give up anytime!"

"I'll give up when lions learn to fly!!!" Spittle flew from Pumbaa's mouth. He was so enraged at the challenge that his eyes were growing veined and bloodshot. He did his best to angle at the meerkat, lifting his tail and squeezing. His left leg kicked up as he farted again. It was more of an explosion than a simple toot. Then his right leg went up. They alternated, Pumbaa releasing in a rapid to and fro motion with his body. But as fast as he went, the building gasses were faster. His body was a brown beach ball, and only getting larger and tighter. The warthog worried his body would rip if he could not outdo it. PHHFAPT!

Timon was not faring much better. His shoulders and thighs were disappearing into his body, four indentations forming along it. The semi-bare tail had all ready been sucked in halfway, and he could feel the gasses even rising up to his head, bloating out the cheeks. He flipped on to his belly, giving Pumbaa a view of the rounded, stretched out stripes down his back. Pumbaa suddenly felt something odd under his tail. It was though any breeze that had been there was vanishing by the moment. His thighs ballooned, as did the base of his tail, quickly covering up his anus. His belly swelled further as well, and it would have done the job had it not all ready been covered. "Uh....Timon, I don't have a good feeling about this."
"Then give up!" he said. His voice seemed a bit hallow, as though speaking through a pool toy. "I knew you couldn't take it."
"No, I can't get it out anymore!" The wart hog began to sweat, his body ballooning frantically, his belly began to swallow up his full thighs, covering up the knees. His arms were sinking in deeper and deeper, up to the elbows. His tail swishing slowed up as the limb was engulfed. His jowls were like an inflated pelican beak and his cheeks began to puff.
"You sure look like a big wind bag!" Timon said, laughing as he made to smack his knee, but his arms were held firmly into his swelling form. He gulped, trying to fart again, when suddenly he realized that he too was unable to release. Before long his body was well over a foot wide, stretching and expanding like it was something to strive for. Timon's short legs were engulfed until just the long feet stuck out of the ball. Deep indentation lines surrounded the foot like a lion's mane. His tail was just a stub, and quickly the arms began to be pulled in further. Timon panicked, but was unable to save himself. He squirmed in vain, his cheeks bumping into his ballooned torso.
12511.title: Continue...

125111.content:
Soon Pumbaa was a tight ball with five bumps around it where his limbs had been. His eyes shut tightly and he could feel his face beginning to take air along with his jaw. Timon's cheeks began to expand. His nose took air, rounding out and closing up the nostrils. He gasped for air, but it did no good. His ears too began to tighten and puff. He could feel his head swelling, the eyes trying to bulge out to gain freedom as veins stretched across the balls. Pumbaa was over three feet wide when his head began to sink inside the ball. The gasses churned and bubbled, looking for any possible outlet and empty space to stretch too. His remaining tail stub quivered like a bobble head as he tried to pass the gas, but it could do more than cause said disturbance

But he did not stop there. Soon he was four feet, five, six, nearly seven feet in diameter as his body creaked and moaned from within. Timon was catching up, a four foot blimp that hardly resembled what he had been moments earlier, even when so bloated with chili. His tail stretched out and spasmed, rolling back inside, and then back out like a party whistle. His eyes continued to balloon, stretching out of the sockets, as did Pumbaa's, the veins covering them like a network of red spaghetti. The eyes began to tremble as they swelled rapidly. More and more they shook, and Pumbaa was worried they might-SPLAT. Too late. Blood oozed form the empty sockets, but even the new opening was not enough to let the gas free. The wart hog's head sunk even deep into the body until he was no more than a giant brown ball. Timon looked like goofy insect from his bulging eyes. His tail stuck out again, but did not roll up. It went taught and trembled. Moments later it began to elongate, filling out in the middle, more and more until it was as round as the rest of his body. Darkness surrounded him as his head sunk deeper and deeper Had his face not been so swollen, he would have asked Pumbaa if he had given up yet. Before the thought could cross his mind, he heard a loud creaking, like someone rubbing a wet finger over a large balloon.

It grew louder and more intense, and then suddenly there was a deafening bang that uprooted all of the grass and trees. Timon was blown over twenty feet away and was covered in dirt from where he had just been. He thought he knew what had happened, but there was nothing he could do but panic. His own body stretched out to over six feet, the back stripes were so thing they were almost invisible by then. The tail caught up, appearing about two thirds of his torso. He felt like his flesh was beginning to tear. He bit his lip and squeezed, doing his best to blow out anything he could. The ears kept expanding until they were huge blimps sticking out of the ball. He felt a sudden tightness, a surge of gas, and then BANG!. The ears were no more. His body groaned and protested. His flesh felt so thin that it may as well have been see through. BAM!! He could not see, but his tail too was no more. Moments later what remained of his body looked like an over heated molecule, bouncing and trembling around.

"Hakuna Matata? Did I win?" PopopopoPOBAM!!!!!! Anything that had remained of the landscape was no more than disturbed dirt as the meerkat blew. Bits of blood and strips of undescernable flesh coated the ground for over one hundred feet.
125111.title: Finale... (Violent Bursting)

13.title: Muscle Bound Freaks (Strength, Bulges, Power)

131.content:
Timon stood at the edge of the local watering hole, staring down into his rippling reflection at the weak, but still handsome, meerkat before him. He'd flex his stringy arms and pose, then sigh and slump, looking defeated.

"I'm tellin' ya Pumbaa, there's one thing we lack..."

Pumbaa sat under a tree, having freshly gorged himself, and with a healthy belch, replied "Uhhh...what's that Timon?"

"Respect!"

"Respect?" the warthog belched confusedly

"That's right, why, look at us...we've been around the savannah more times than half these mooks!" Timon jerked his thumb behind him, pointing out several other animals that were cooling their throats with a drink. "But lookit us, they wouldn't bat a tail at us...we're nobodies!"

"Oh..." Pumbaa grunted. "I dunno Timon...do we really NEED respect? I think all we really need is food!"

"Exactly!" Timon raised his hands in exclaimation, hopping on his fat friend's belly and prodding his wet snout. "Respect would get us food! It would get us ANYTHING we want!"

"A...Anything?" Pumbaa's mind began grinding away at the possibilities, perhaps Timon was on to something? "Buuut, how do we GET respect Timon?"

Timon looked taken aback, he hadn't thought this out. "Well...well for one, you gotta be in charge! And to be in charge...you gotta be the biggest, the best...the STRONGEST!" He again attempted a flex, only a weak whisp of fur appeared on his arms, blowing in the wind. "I think it's about time I change my physique..." Timon stroked his chin, his sneaky mind clicking away.
131.title: Timon is tired of being a runt

1312.content:
Timon paced back in forth, pausing at times, then commencing again. What could make them big enough to get respect and strength? Working out was the first answer, unfortunately it would take too long for his tastes. He wanted to bulk up, and he wanted it now!

Just then a strange object fell from the sky and whacked the meerkat on the noggin.

"Ouch!" Timon yelped, having nearly been knocked out and flopping to the floor. He sat up, rubbing his head

"Alright...what wise guy threw-" he paused as he looked in front of him. It was some sort of container. He looked closer to see a label with big print.

"Bulk-up. Get bigger instantly. Get the respect you deserve." Just then his eyes lit up. This was it, the answer to their problems. "Eureka! Look Pumbaa! This will get us the respect we deserve!"

"What is it Timon?" asked the portly porcine.

"Bulk-Up pills. It will let us get bigger instantly. Now we can show the real nobodies who deserves their respect!"

He continues reading the bottle, getting bored right before he reads the side-effects. He opens the bottle and tosses the cap away...
1312.title: Answer from Above.

choices: Timon Wants More, Another Pill Down the Hatch!
13121.content:
"Uhh, Timon, are you sure you want to do that?" Pumbaa looked cautiously at the bottle, and at his little friend who at the moment was fishing out one of the many pills from the bottle.

"Of COURSE I do Pumbaa! This is it! This is everything I...uh...we, could've wanted!"

And with that, Timon pulled a large white pill from the bottle, and quickly stuffed it in his mouth. A large bulge was sticking from his throat as he made the attempt to swallow it...

"Gulk..gak..." Timon skittered towards the watering hole and dunked his head in the cool liquid, gulping a good mouthful down so as to take the pill to it's rightful place in his belly. "Ahh, dat's better..." Timon sputtered once he came up for air. Pumbaa merely looked him over curiously.

"Did it work Timon?" he asked.

They waited a moment before Timon looked himself over and showed signs of intense disappointment, a scowl appearing on his face. "Naah, Pumbaa, what mook woulda thought a little pill like that would do anything?" He threw his hands in the air before crossing them as he pouted.

Pumbaa felt his friend's pain and looked downtrodden, nudging the little meerkat's elbow with his wet snout to try and comfort him. Timon merely turned away, his only response was a hiccup. And then another...and another! Suddenly Timon's tail began to vibrate as if someone had flicked it, the vibration worked it's way up the meerkat's striped back, making Timon bounce around as if he'd been bitten.

"Timon?? Timon are you okay?" an alarmed Pumbaa shouted.

"P...P...Puuumbaaaa..." Timon stuttered and began hiccupping violently, he finally stopped shaking long enough to cover his mouth. All seemed calm for a moment...and then another loud hiccup, and another...this time, however, Timon's body was reacting! Each hiccup seemed to pump the stringbean meerkat up! After the fourth hiccup Timon's arms had shown clear signs of bubbling, growing in various ways, his chest had began sticking out further than before like he'd taken in a large breath of air. Timon could do nothing, looking himself over in complete shock!

"Pum-HIC-ba! Look-HYUP-me!" and both Timon and Pumbaa watched as the meerkat's lithe body took on much more bulk in his upper body and legs, his hiccups appearing to bulge each muscle, almost appearing as balloons inflating under his fur. After several minutes of the shocking event, there stood Timon, he was double his size, both in mass and in height. His head sat atop a thickened and toned neck, arms at the very peak of "strong", his biceps bulged when he flexed THIS time, even pushing a couple snaking veins against the skin! He had a brilliant barrel chest, he had pecs for once! His stomach was tight and lined with bumpy abs, a stark contrast to it's normally full and rounded shape. His thighs had grown thick and meaty, his calves were flexing even as he stood there admiring himself. Timon's striped back was now wider than before, rippling his brown markings across it.

"Pumbaa, I'm...I'm buff!" Timon smiled ear to ear, stretching and flexing his body, spinning around to take himself in and show off to Pumbaa, working any large bulging part of his body that he could. "What mook woulda thought a little pill like that would do anything?" Timon beamed.

Pumbaa merely sat in disbelief, Timon was just an inch taller than Pumbaa when standing on all fours, and it was quite a surreal sight.
13121.title: Takes a pill and muscles form.

choices: Get a better feel of each other's muscles.
131211.content:
Timon continued on with his little posing routine in front of Pumbaa. Showing off any and all the muscles he could as he paused while doing a downward left bicep flex, "Hey Pumbaa, get a good feel o' that!"

Pumbaa went right ahead and began feeling Timon's peaked bicep. He even tried to give it a good squeeze, but there was no use trying after the first few times. "Wow Timon! It's almost as hard as steel!"

"I practically feel as tough as steel, my hoggy friend."
