Pumbaa closed his mouth as he swallowed the pill in one gulp. They both waited for a short time, but after half a minute, nothing has changed. "Pumbaa, you feel anything?"

Pumbaa glanced away as he thought to himself, "Hmm... Nothing yet." All of a sudden, there was a bubbling noise that appears to be coming from Pumbaa's stomach, "Although, I think the pill gave me indigestion. Ugggh..." Pumbaa fell back to the ground as he held his stomach in agony.

Timon rushed to Pumbaa's side, "Pumbaa! Oh no... Are you okay?! Huh?" Timon was looking at Pumbaa's stomach, which was starting to bubble and make gurgling noises. "... Hey...Hey Pumbaa! I think it's working!"

Pumbaa suddenly sat up, "I'm right here y'know. You don't have to yell."

This caused Timon to flinch, "Yaugh! Pumbaa! You're not aching in pain anymore."

"Nope. I guess it was only for a moment."

Timon pointed down to Pumbaa's legs, "'Gasp!' Look Pumbaa!" They both were astonished to see Pumbaa's leg muscles grow right in front of them! Now, Pumbaa's legs were pretty strong to start out with, the pill caused all the muscles in his calves and thighs to really stick out a lot more. Pumbaa's calves didn't really show much at first, but they soon bulged right out of his legs, becoming a fairly large pair of double-diamond calves. Pumbaa's quads and hamstrings were the next, tensing and flexing out on their own. More than enough to make each leg be pushed away from each other. "Pumbaa, your legs! They've become mammoth-sized!" Timon began giving Pumbaa's still-bulging thighs a good feel, "Now it looks like you'll be able to run down that mountain along with me. And more so!" Pumbaa suddenly moved his upper body forward as his back muscles were starting to push out and ripple, as well as cause his lats to spread out more too. "Wow! Look at your back! And your lats! They're really starting to clump together. No'll look at your backside funny anymore." Once the muscles on Pumbaa's back slowed, Pumbaa laid his upper body back as he held himself up with both his arms. Pumbaa's rounded stomach was starting to grow less flabby and began to form abdominal muscles that were popping out one-by-one until he had a well-defined, pot-bellied 8-pack that was tensing and flexing on their own. Pumbaa's chest was also be affected, as two large bumps started to form, becoming large pectoral muscles that Pumbaa could almost feel with his chin. But then Pumbaa's neck muscles were starting to bulge out, causing his chin to be lifted further away from his chest. "My friend, you whole upper body frame is nearly built to perfection!", Timon said as he continued watching. The last were Pumbaa's arms, which he lifted up and began flexing them. The surge of energy first entered Pumbaa's shoulders, as they swelled up greatly, pushing his arms further away from his body. Pumbaa's biceps and triceps were the main parts being flexed, so they showed no hesitation as they throbbed and pumped right out of his once skinny arms to form two bowling ball-shaped biceps that peaked a little higher and higher every few seconds. Finally were Pumbaa's forearms, which both bulged out to finish up his arms at once, causing Pumbaa to clench his fists even harder. After about a minute, Pumbaa's growth was finally over. Timon stood up, "So Pumbaa, how do you feel?"

Pumbaa also followed as he now was able to stand up on only two legs. Pumbaa looked down to see he was not standing 6 feet tall, and was two feet taller than Timon. Pumbaa looked at his muscular arms, and then said, "I feel...I feel like...like..."

"Yes, go ahead Pumbaa. Express yourself!"

"I feel like..." Pumbaa quickly did a pose where he was leaning on his left leg while stretching his right leg out, and flexing his left arm while stretching his right arm out towards the sky, "...I can take on any brick wall only using my tusks!" Pumbaa did a different pose, his body turned to his right side while flexing his right arm upwards and flexing his left arm downwards against his side, "Like I can make it through any storm, or hurricane, or tsunami!" Pumbaa did another pose, flexing both arms downward as he gripped both his hands and began flexing his pecs one-by-one, "Like I can take on any foe, no matter what size level they happen to be!" Pumbaa relaxed all his muscles, "But most of all, I feel great! I've never felt as powerful as this before."

"More powerful than after training with that wolverine?"

"Much more powerful than that." Pumbaa began doing a couple more bodybuilding poses, "Oh boy! I feel like just ramming my tusks into a full-fledged mountain."

Timon thought to himself for a moment, "Hmm... That does sound nice, but I think I've got somethin' else in mind."

Pumbaa asks while wagging his tail, "Really? What do you suggest we do?"

1353.content:
Zazu is your average, small weakling. Not my words but it has been said and uttered by Simba and many of African animals from all around. Zazu never minded it much at first but now it starts bringing down little by little the more someone speaks ill of his size as he soars through the desert on his own for minutes on end. He would speak to Rafiki about it every so often but even the old baboon couldn't help but mess with the poor bird and make fun of his stature. After seeing someone such as Simba grow into a strong, powerful lion, he was starting to wish he could grow big someday. If only there was a way...

Before he knew it, the hornbill was starting to tire himself out, not realizing how long he had be adrift in the sky. "Oh dear... How long have I been flying for?", he pants. He immediately dives and lands safely underneath a marula tree. The poor bird needed to quench his thirst quick before he passes out. He hops around on his talons a bit scouring for a small pond of any kind. No such thing came to be until... "What in heaven's...?"

The next thing he notices was a miniature pond, but there was something really off with it. He decides to leap down and land closer in front of it. Not only was it smaller than any pond he came across, it was looking rather...purplish. And no this is not because it was nearly sundown. "What is with water?" He takes a quick look around. "Should I even drink from this?" Zazu's mind kept telling him 'no' but his dehydrated body kept telling him 'yes'. "Hm... Maybe one sip couldn't hurt. I am really thirsty you know.", he remarks, as if he were speaking to someone else.

The hornbill bird gently dips his beak into the pond and takes a quick sip, worried it might have tasted horrible. But to his surprise... "My word...! That was really good!" Zazu dips his beak in again, even using his feather palms to help slurp more down until he felt full. The quenched avian sits down firmly on his bottom, thinking about the wonderful agua he guzzled down in his bouncy belly. "That was quite tasty. If I do say so myself.", he chuckles.

Then, completely out of nowhere, he starts to feel his body shaking. His belly balloon seemed to have disappeared in an instant, lengthening out at least two feet! He looks at his shaking feathers, which elongate the same amount as well. His tiny legs soon sprouted outwards and gained two-and-a-half feet more in length just like the rest of his body. "Oh my!", the hornbill squawks, unable to fathom what the heck just happened to his body. He took at his arms and legs, which had no muscle tone, but made him look like a bird mixed with human attributes. "Did...that pond have something to do with this...?", he muttered, glancing down at the purplish pond.

He inches closer to see his reflection in the water. What he sees next surprises him even more! His next muscles started clench, forming out some chiseled features as his traps splay out on his shoulders. "M-my neck!", Zazu screams, completely oblivious to the fact his voice had just grown deep and more masculine. Suddenly his shoulders were beginning to twinge. As his neck widens, his shoulders broaden, turning into some nice boulders that could compete well against any rhino he'd stumble across.

He then felt a short pain in his arms, holding out firmly as he watches his biceps and triceps beef themselves outward, almost as big as bowling balls if flexed hard enough. His forearms crunch themselves out as well, along with gaining some big, meaty palms. "My... My arms...", Zazu utters, a small grin appearing on his beak. Things only got better as he felt his chest start to bulge up as two meaty slabs of pecs protrude underneath the birds beak. "I... I have pecs now!", the bird exclaims excitedly. "Oooh...!!", he grunts, covering his stomach as if he were suffering from a stomach ache. Thankfully, it was anything but. His abdomen started out flat, but he could feel a set of abs form one by one as if his belly was being pumped with hot air. In seconds. he proudly displays an exquisite 8-pack that would even make Simba jealous.

Zazu soon bends his body forward, feeling his back muscles start to stuff themselves up as his upper body frame widens, promptly gaining a sinewy, rippling back with a V-shape form with his proud muscles. His feathery tail whips upwards as his glutes inflated out and then tightened as if he were flexing them for the crowd like anyone in a bodybuilding competition. Oh... He could just see himself out there now! Flexing for his fellow brethren, displaying his newly formed physique to the animal kingdom to gaze and gawk over.

On to pressing matters. His leg muscles develop the most, turning his skinny pipes into an intimidating set of thighs and hamstrings. So powerful he could vision himself just running through the Savannah, rather than flying over it. And last but not least, his calves bulge up beneath his hamstrings, a double-diamond pair getting full attention in return. His talons then grow thicker, much like his palms, looking powerful and strapping feet that could emit waves on the ground if he smashed them hard enough. And with that, his painful and pleasureful episode muscle and mass came to an end as his body muscles were left heaving in and out all around. A few impressive veins were spread out across the most noticeable of the hornbill's massive muscles.

Zazu slowly manages to get back up on his burly feet. He couldn't even utter a word at what he just experienced. It's even more unbelievable that he'd stumble across a pond that if ingested help increase one's muscles to that of pro bodybuilder! The ecstatic bird takes a look around his whole, muscular frame, starting with his arms. He even had hands now, who'd of thought? After a minute of gawking he gives his arm a much-needed good flex, feeling up his marvelous bicep with his other palm. "This is... This is absolutely wonderful!", the bird screams, finally noticing his changed voice. "Whoa my...! Is that my voice?!", he blasts, feeling nothing but satisfied with his new, deeper tone.

He turns to the pond once again, kneeling down on both knees to get a closer view of his bulky frame. He locks his fingers with each other while raising gently against beneath his chest as he bouncing those mighty pecs a couple times. "Incredible... I wonder how I would sound if I were to squawk really loud." For that, he decided to save in his memory for another time. He then continues by showing off many of the other muscles with his reflection in the pond: flexing his rippling arms against his chest, crunching that sick set of abs every so often while patted them boastfully with one fist. "I never even imagined gaining my own set of stomach muscles. What a proud moment this is!"

Zazu gladly stands up to show off his enormous legs, flexing out those quads and calves for him and his reflection to see. "My legs are stupendous! I barter I can outrun any mountain lion if I had the mind to!", he boasts. After spending a good chuck of time idolizing his new body, a quick theory had run through his mind as he stare intently at the pond. "Hmm... I wonder..." Zazu uses both his sturdy palms to gather a pretty good amount of water, which he manages to slurp all down in one gulp. Gulp "Hmm... Eeh...! Ooh...!"" Is body responds almost immediately, his muscles soon absorbing the water like vitamins. His entire body throbs, the feeling the bird was getting becoming nothing more than euphoric his muscles beef up in size a little bit more. He even gaining a good inch or two in height.

"Hah! It's just as I suspected!", the avian roars, giving his body a quick most muscular flex. "This pond is nothing more than a magic pond that grants anyone who drinks it much more muscle mass! It's odd I came across it, but I wonder if anyone else has... Wait a minute...!" The titan of a bird takes a quick look around at his surroundings. "Where in the world am I even?!" The area he resided in contained nothing more than patches of African grass, the lone marula tree, and the pond containing purple water. "Hm... Well, guess I had better be returning. Oh ho, wait until the crowd takes a notice of this muscular, hornbill bird. I'll show them what real power really is!", he cries out fondly, flexing up both of his beefy arms. "I'll even keep this pond a secret.", he winks to the audience.

He leans in promptly before the magic water. "Alright dear friend, we shall meet again soon. Just in case I come across any folks who still tower me by a good amount." Instead of flying though, he takes up the challenge and decides to run right through the Savannah. Just to see how long his vigorous thighs can outlast. With a lift of one over the other, "And away we go!", Zazu sprints off in a heartbeat. What adventures could he come across next...

Clearly, they were too busy to take note. "These guys take FOREVER to get outta here...I'm inna hurry and...I...heh..." Timon's grin spread across his face, remembering his current situation. Soon he had lifted his foot, wriggling his toes and then dropped it like an anvil. *SPLORCH*

In no more than a sickening second, half the herd had been flattened by the gigantic foot, and by now, the rest took GREAT notice and began panicking, stomping off in every direction from the disaster. "THAT'S how you get out of afternoon traffic!" he joked to himself, again puffing out his chest with pride, Timon started to realize what this meant. He just took out elephants, the biggest creatures on the land! But no longer, not with Timon: King of the Meerkats around! "Yeah..." he gazed off into space as delusion set in. "I like the sound of that! And...and the only rightful place for a TRUE king..." he stared off into the distance at Pride Rock.

"Welp, mustn't keep my loyal subjects waiting! It's not everyday they get to meet their truuue king!" his heart thumped at the thought. "But first...a little refreshment..." he looked to the East, seeing a glistening watering hole, just perfect, he thought. A few monsterous stomps later and he found himself towering over the wonderful drinking water...a few gazelles had launched themselves away from the meerkat, and still other animals stared up in complete shock, frozen in fear around the hole. "Fear not subjects, your king merely wishes to partake in a drink with the common folk." Timon said, with an air of snobbery. Within seconds he landed on his knees, trapping a cheetah underneath one, grinding him into the ground. Timon dunked his mouth into the water and began gulping away. A few more slurps, a hiccup, and the watering hole was no more. Timon crudely belched, blowing several animals off into the grasses. "That's better..." any remaining animals that had survived had since run off into the distance. "It's hard being amonst a celebrity, I understand!" he gloated to himself, more than anything. As he sat there, patting his water-filled lump of a belly, he looked off in the direction of Pride Rock. "This may take longer than I thought..."

152111.content:
It was a hot and sweltering day in the savanna, actually a little over 100 Fahrenheit. Timon was trying to beat the heat by going on his makeshift hammock in the shade while Pumbaa just lied down under a tree sleeping. He tried to got comfortable in his spot and to sleep, but of course, there was a problem, Pumbaa's snoring. He just laid there with an annoyed look on his face, and decided to go out for a walk since he couldn't take much more of it.

He walked through the exotic jungle like terrain, looking at the nature life around him and ate some bugs along the way. He started get exhausted after awhile, but then he came across a river. He drank the water to quench his thirst. He then decided to follow the river upstream. After traveling for about half an hour, he found himself face to face with a waterfall, the river's source surrounded be rocky cliffs. He jumped in the water to cool himself down. After soaking for a bit, he thought he saw something through the water. He then went through the falling wall of liquid, and hopped onto a smooth rock platform. He then found natural formed rock stairs that lead farther down into the cave, and when he approached the last step to the bottom, he found an entryway that lead to a room.

When he entered the room, he was left in awe at what he found. Smack dab in the middle of the room was a pool of water, and the walls of the room had weird runes painted or marked on them. He approached the pool and looked into the water. It was crystal clear and blue and he could see his reflection perfectly.

What does he do next?
152111.title: A hidden pool behind a waterfall

As he swam he was oblivious to what was occurring.as he got out of the water, he felt a strange tingling throughout his body. He looked down to see his chest swell to ridiculous proportions. He stared at them dumbstruck, until he felt the tingling increase at his crotch. He tried to get a better view, and slipped on the slick floor. It was crisp and clear, starry night in the Savannah grass plains. Underneath a dead tree lied two animals, a meerkat and a warthog. Both were lying on their backs, but the meerkat was on top of the red wild pig's stomach.

The pig named Pumbaa was in deep sleep, snoring louder than a lion's roar. Timon the meerkat could barely sleep at all because of this. He just star gazed the whole time, hoping the snoring would subside soon. It wasn't long until he saw something in the sky. It was a shiny blueish white dot that gradually got closer and bigger. No, it was shooting star! Heading straight towards him and his companion!

The meerkat was shaking in fear while trying to wake the pig in deep sleep. He feared the worst, but realized that the object was breaking apart in some places. Luckily, the space object happened to pass over them by 20ft and struck the ground about the same distance north away from them. A small quake rattled the ground after impact, that made Timon lose his balance and fell off his still snoozing friend.

After he got up from his short fall, he decided to see what that thing was, not bothering with waking the warthog. As he got to the crash site, he discovered a small crater that looked to be about 12ft wide yet only about 5ft deep. In that crater he saw a rock that was about 1/3 of his size. It was amazing how something so small could cause this much damage. He touch the ground which was cool, making it safe to approach it. As he got near, he discovered that the rock was glowing with a blue light. He was about to touch it until the light emulating from the rock pulsated and blinded him in a flash.

What happens next?
1521122221.title: Meerkat Meets Meteorite

1521122221221.content:
After the flash subsided, he let his eyes try to adjust itself for a minute or two.

He then was surprised that his surroundings were in a closed in area than the open plains like before. It was a confined square space where the walls were made out of a combination of sturdy bark, branches, and mostly grass which held the tropical debris The floor was pretty much just smoothed out grass and dirt. Everything about the place screamed that some kind of giant lives here. In his left corner, there was a huge mound of soft leaves, shaped in 6ft rectangular fashion and about a 1.5ft in height. There were three huge rocks in the opposite corner. One was the biggest with a flat smooth surface and the two other rocks at its right and left side that had flat surfaces too, but were smaller and not as wide. There was a small square opening or window above it, letting the sunlight in. They seem to be used as a table and two chairs. A round mirror was hung over another small similar stone like the ones near the table. Next to it was some kind of makeshift box made out of sticks and tree bark that was used to storage things. In front of him was the entry way, but block by some kind of wooden plank, leading to outside or to another part of the grass container.

"Hello? Anyone here? Pumbaa?" the meerkat broke the silence, still wondering where he is and how he got there. Then, he remembered about the space rock. Where did that thing went to? He looked more at his surroundings, hoping that it would take him back to the savanna, his home and away from whatever the heck this place was.

Did he find it?

“Hey, it’s starting to get late, I think we should take refuge in the tree of life right over there. I bet Rafiki would be kind enough to let us in.” Timon pointed at the Tree of Life down the road from the duo.

Timon knocked on the door, “Hey, Rafiki! Would ya be a dear and let us spend the night?? PLEASE?”

The door creaked open slowly, no one was clearly opening it up for them. Timon and Pumbaa stepped into the dark tree. Bowls of fruit and spices covered tables made out of acacia wood.

“I will let you stay, IF you test out some spells for me...”

Timon and Pumbaa knew that voice belonged to Rafiki, but they couldn’t see him.

A hand grabbed Pumbaa’s shoulder and dragged him off into the darkness of the tree. Timon quickly turned around and saw Pumbaa screaming as he was being taken by the force.

Timon and Pumbaa has their fair share of crystal water, it seemed that when they didn’t want anymore it just sucked them right back in, they lapped up massive amounts of water until their stomachs were about to burst. Pumbaa had felt the water go straight to his stomach, the water weighed him down for a little bit. His legs dangling above ground. He let out a massive burp and went in for round two.

Timon on the other hand was lapping up the water eagerly, he was even using his hands to get more water in him, he soon got on all fours and drank pints of water at a time. 1541.content:
The branches on the giant old tree rustled as a slight breeze blew through the area, only accomplishing blowing the heat around on the Savannah's surface. As the sun baked the land, the tree provided a minute amount of relief from the burning orb. A few grasses around the massive base of the gnarled tree provided cover for the reddish brown plump warthog that stared upward with a worried look on his bumpy face.

"Errr, Timon? You don't think he'll notice we've been here, do you?" the warthog humbly asked as several trinkets tumbled from the high branches and landed nearby.

"I don't know what..." the meerkat hollered tossing a few bowls and branches down "...you're talking about Pumbaa!"

"Well it's just that...er...you seem to be making quite a mess..." Pumbaa looked at the increasingly large pile of the mandrill's possessions at his hoofs.

"Got it!" Pumbaa's attention was quickly drawn upward once more as the slender meerkat lept from the branches above and seemed to bounce off the trunk until he landed onto Pumbaa's back.

"Got what?" Pumbaa attempted to turn his head to see Timon.

"This!" the meerkat held out a large, clearly halved coconut, he removed the top and within was a pile of glittering red powder. "That old mook was holding out somethin' great! Let me tell ya Pumbaa, you and me are gonna eat like KINGS!" the meerkat practically danced on Pumbaa's back.

"And you're sure Rafiki wont mind us using it?"

"Ah what does that old monkey know? He'll never miss it! You should've seen all the things he had up there, quite a pig really..." Pumbaa looked disgruntled at the remark, kicking some of the 'things' that littered the base of the tree "I think I've seen it." he said in a grumble. Timon capped the coconut once more and held it tight to his skinny body, the look of excitement clearly in his eyes. He kicked his heels against Pumbaa's chubby sides and yelled "Let's go get us some grub!"

And with that, the duo were kicking up dust, putting more and more distance between them and Rafiki's home tree.

********

Timon and Pumbaa then did what they did best, gathering all manner of insects to gorge on, grabbing fat grubs, large beetles, digging in logs, in the trees, under rocks for any bounty they might provide. Pumbaa wanted nothing more than to slurp down the goods right away, but Timon was adamant they wait...an odd thing for the meerkat to say, of this the warthog was sure. Over the course of an hour the two had amassed a large pile of writhing, squirming insects, a beautiful sight for either of the healthy eaters.

"Oh boy Timon, NOW can we eat them?" Pumbaa licked his lips, leaving a few strands of drool to spill to the ground.

"Not JUST yet my portly pal! Just watch and learn!" Timon said, rubbing his grubby paws together. He pulled the coconut they'd looted close, turning the top and pulling it free, revealing the pile of powder once more. Pumbaa couldn't help but stare at it with wonder, though his eyes darted back at the pile of food he had to work so hard for as well. Timon patted his furry knees as he sat up and stepped over to the pile, grabbing a red beetle free and held it between his thumb and forefinger. "This, Pumbaa, is why it was worth the wait!" And with that, Timon took a pinch of the powder and sprinkled it liberally on the bug.

Timon's grin began to stretch across his face as the bug squirmed in his grasp, Pumbaa moved in close and stared the morsel down, wanting nothing more than to just EAT it than watch anything else right now. Suddenly the bug surged in size, larger at first, then a second spurt and the bug appeared to be getting FATTER as well. Timon's finger grasp turned into a cupped palm, and after two more surges the meerkat had both his hands holding on to the grotesquely swollen beetle.

"T-Timon!"

"Hee heeee, just watch Pumbaa!" Timon's arms shook as the bug inflated before their eyes, the red carapace seemed unable to spread with the body, it's entire body spreading apart at the seams allowing it to take on the appearance of a swollen, pulsating milky colored mass. Finally Timon was forced to drop the once small insect, it bounced on the ground and quivered into place. Timon shivered and hugged the him-sized ball of insect. Tiny legs faught against the air as Timon's face sunk into the milky mass. The meerkat licked it over, smacking his lips and then showing Pumbaa up with a "Ta da!"

info.brief_description: They're putty in your hands, mold them as you see fit
info.description:
Timon and Pumbaa are the perfect examples of characters that you can do just anything to, and to any extreme.

Feel free to fatten them up (individually or at the same time), inflate them, make them the most disgusting of slobs, make them the size of Godzilla and flatten anything in their path, or give them the muscles of a god. Have fun with it, and don't feel restricted. Go through any means, or any extreme.
